name: Data Stack Dev Container
postStartCommand: bash -c 'set -ex; service postgresql start; until pg_isready; do sleep 1; done; echo "PostgreSQL is ready"; if [ -f "/streamlit/app.py" ]; then nohup streamlit run /workspace/app.py --server.address=0.0.0.0 --server.port=8501 > /tmp/streamlit.log 2>&1 & else echo "Streamlit app not found."; fi; echo "Starting Ollama service..."; nohup ollama serve > /tmp/ollama_serve.log 2>&1 & for i in {1..60}; do if nc -z localhost 11434; then echo "Ollama service is up"; break; fi; echo "Waiting for Ollama service..."; sleep 1; done; echo "Preloading llama3.2 model..."; ollama pull llama3.2 | tee /tmp/ollama.log; exit 0'
